name: Storage Scoring
description: Scoring template for Storage super-sector patents. Includes data integrity and storage efficiency metrics.

questions.question: How well does this patent protect data integrity and reliability? Consider error correction, data protection, redundancy, and recovery mechanisms.
questions.reasoningPrompt: Describe data integrity protections and failure handling.

questions.question: Rate the storage efficiency improvements this technology enables. Consider compression, deduplication, tiering, and capacity optimization.
questions.reasoningPrompt: Identify specific efficiency techniques and expected gains.

questions.question: How does this patent improve storage performance? Consider IOPS, throughput, latency, and access patterns.
questions.reasoningPrompt: Describe performance improvements for different workloads.
